It is an amazing game. The only thing keeping me from rating it 5 stars is the fact that when I minimize it and come back to play later it restart the game making me start from a save point. Mobile games are played in short increments and when you have to restart at save points it becomes tedious. I always save the game before minimizing so I don't lose items. I just have to waste time walking back to where I was and don't always have time to make it to the next fountain before I minimize.
Controls still needs getting used to. The targeting still way off as the closest mob is not being targeted first but still a very good game! Well done!
That boss monster in the catacombs who spawns all the level 14 zombies needs to be nerfed! There's like 100 zombies surrounding him and you get no exp for killing them lmao
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback and sorry for the trouble! We are currently investigating this issue and believe it might have to do with a download in the background, where the progress popup is missing. Can you make sure that you have enough storage space available and try again?
Kind regards,
HG-Support

content: Absolutely amazing! Best phone game I ever played! I was skeptical and concerned because of the price at first but I watched some videos about the game and I was like ok this is awesome. Ended up buying it and don't regret it I haven't put it down since. I already have 2 chars 40+. The build diversity and combinations are endless. Skills and animations are flashy. Monsters and bosses are well designed and look amazing! Best rpg mobile game ever great job devs!
Brilliant

A great mobile port. I'm not a fan of touch controls usually but these are done well. I did complete the base game a while ago using them as a ranged character so they definitely work, looking forward to controller support. The game seems to run better than it used to and the graphics seemed to be better as well but maybe it's just been a while since I've played it. Overall if you want a hack and slash loot rig this is the game. $20 is a steal on the amount of content you get üëçüëç
OnePlus 6T works perfectly, on max settings, no issues whatsoever. Although works very poorly on my tablet, even on the lowest settings textures turns black and it's hardly possible to play.
Worth it

Game is amazing! HOWEVER, I cannot log in to play whenever I pick my character, I get the error "tagMenuCantDownload"....I have reinstalled the app, tried on and off wifi, it just will not let me play......please fix and I'll update my review! EDIT: seems to be working again, I've been able to play 3 times now without issue...5 stars again!
replyContent:
Sorry to hear that the problems returned in a worse way! We didn't do anything that should lead to crashes at startup. But we got some reports that game booster and similar software seem to interfere with the game in a bad way. If you have something like that running give it a try to deactivate it. Thank you!
Kind regards, HG-Support

content: Looks and plays amazing. Controls are great! Even stylus support on Note20 Ultra. Bravo. One of my fav games from the early 2000's! Level 21 already, an amazing experience so far! Something I noticed, on any coast full screen texture pop in and some really bright artifacts. Pretty much the only "bug/glitch" I've seen.
Had teouble in the beginning with the dl. Once that was resolves its smooth sailing. Game runs smooth. Controlls are much better than the first version. This full version is worth the $20.
A masterpiece of a title. This port aside a few control bugs has so far been acceptable. I have come across one game breaking bug though. When using a controller on bluetooth the game crashes.

I actually had to buy the original TQ released through Kindle appstore because its the only version i can currently play without it glitching out or just crashing. Total waste of money if im being honest :( im running it on a fire hd 10 (9th gen) i uninstalled and reinstalled it. It ran slightly better but it still has issues loading textures. I get these black areas that dont load then the games lags then crashes completely. Please fix this!! I love this game and must play through to Atlantis!!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback and sorry for the bad experience so far! Sounds like a memory issue and not being able to load all textures at the same time. We have to check how to improve that with an update. Thank you!

content: About to finish the first act and I'm really excited to finally have the full TQ experience on my phone. DLC added a lot of pieces the base version didn't have (A STASH, OMG!). Android users rejoice and check this out if you are interested in a true aRPG on mobile. I'll mention auto targeting is decent but wonky at times. You'll run past pressing threats to whack an archer in the corner on occasion. Biggest qualm; talking to vendors in crowds of NPCs as there is no way to specify a talk target.

This is a solid port of a classic and it's great to have all the content that has come out, including recent content, for $20. The touchscreen controls can be a bit finicky but it's still very playable. You just need to use builds that don't require quite as much precision. It would be great if they added controller support in the future though.

Love it! My only gripe is that there's no controller support. For a game that price I was hoping to see it. But aside from that what more could you want? It's the full PC port and she's smooth as eggs!
I just bought game 5 star interested after reading reviews. I'll be back time to check it out.
After creating character I can't start the game, it keep stucking in the menus. Please help, im using nubia redmagic 5g with android 10.
replyContent: Sorry for the trouble! That sound like not every necessary data was installed. Can you try reinstalling the game and use a wifi connection during installation and see if that helps? Also be sure to have at least 4GB of storage left on your device. Kind regards,

The one thing is the targeting system when you hold down to attack sometimes your dude runs off and leaves the one you want to attack for something not even in the screen yet. Other then that I love it! üòç
you should add controller support in a future update because the control screen our kind of wonky

This is by far one of the BEST releases available on any Mobile Device. I have played this game for years since around 2010. It will never beat Diablo 2/Lord Of Destruction but it sure as hell tries and does it well. Now my only complaint that is valid is the lack of Multiplayer even if it is just 2 - 4. That will make the game perfect in my opinion and why I cant give a 5 star. My only other small issue is the need for optimization. Once that happens then you guys will have alot more users.

a great game but with the ff issues: buggy controls, you will approach the enemy as if you are melee when using range attacks, as if the char has a mind of its own. save option does not work, played for 6 hrs, only to have my progress not saved. what a waste of money.
I paid the whole game & I was too excited to play but wait, i cannot start the game when pressing start. kinda dissapointed at the moment. any solutions for this???
replyContent:
Hey there, please try to restart your device and ensure you have atleast 4GB of free storage space.
Then start the game with a stable internet connection (preferably wifi) and see if that resolves the problem.
If this doesn't help, please try to reinstall the game, but remember to backup your files to keep your progress!
Kind regards, HG-Support

You're looking at the store page of the first publisher/devs who have the courage to release a true PC loot-hack 'n slash game on mobile platform. They are pioneers imo. TQ has the depth and replay value like the better PC games in this genre, it's a little slower in progressing but with huge content. The game has been designed to entertain players instead of finding out how to be F2P but still find ways to make people buy their microtransactions. 20 euro is what you pay, a bargain for what you get in return! Here's a list of features you might want to know: - 8 classes, some 'classics' but also unusual classes. - You'll have the option to choose a 2nd class to combine their strengths. - Loot qualities ranging from common to legendary, of course there are several set items for each class.We're talking about a loot-hack 'n slash here :) - You can craft, enchant, add enhancements, find recipes. - Access to stash and extra slots (no microtransactions, yaay! ;-) ), transfer stash. - Game + If this sounds good to you then I'd say give it a try! If you are interested but not sure, then watching some gameplay videos, checking the wiki are also helpfull to make you decide if it's worth it to you.

Thanks for updating this gem! Been playing this game on and off since cdrom is still a thing, wish the speed slider was ported too but its ok. Now I can play on the go with cloudsave implemented. This game is the first true successor of diablo 2. Kudos to the devs! Edit: the cloudsave isn't working.. pls fix. Edit2: Looking forward to it, and thanks for the swift reply. Edit3: I reinstalled the game using a fast internet connection, the cloudsave feature is now working :)
